website_summaries.verdict: This is a set of two nonstick pans with a unique embossed design that promotes airflow around your baked goods.
pros: Two sizes included in the set
Sheets can go in the dishwasher
cons: The pans could rust if not dried thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: What a bunch of junk! First time used tonight for baked tilapia. You can see how warped the pan is right before I took it out and then showing it on the trivet. If I could I would return. Received on Friday and the box has been broken down already. What an absolute waste of $30. Really mad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusty if not dried thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about,the design holds water if not dried thoroughly,rusts
customer_reviews.author: Penny Gilpin

customer_reviews.title: They are the Best.
customer_reviews.text: You do not need to put parchment paper on them. I made chocolate chip cookies on them they just slid off. Clean with a damp paper towel .
customer_reviews.author: William D Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This product is misleading in that it looks like it would be problematic to clean. But no! I’m glad I listened to the other reviews. This cookie sheet is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Goober

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I was looking for They seem to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Food cooks evenly and it cleans up with ease. I still use non stick spray, but I thought it would be difficult to clean. It was not cleans up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: mecca woods

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy non stick baking sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Love the non stick surface and weight of them. Cookies just slipped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan
customer_reviews.text: I love the pans. They allow air to get under the food I am cooking, which gives a nice crisp to the food. They are also easy to clean. I just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Great Baking
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful to bake on and food does not stick. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: cmoose

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of even baking on the bottom because of the design the airflow works better.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of these pans. Rust developed after one use!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Tis the season!
customer_reviews.text: I want to bake Cookies for Christmas season and wanted to get some good cookie sheets. That's what I bought really good Baking Sheet pans to make cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

product_meta.title: Taste of Home 2-Piece Non-Stick Metal Baking Sheet Set 15x10 and 17x11
product_meta.description: Bake your family favorites using the Taste of Home 2-Piece Non-Stick Metal Baking Sheet Set. This durable bakeware is designed for everyday use and is an ideal choice for the home chef. You'll enjoy baking a variety of foods on this baking sheet set from tasty desserts to savory sheet pan dinners. Our bakeware features an embossed geometric design that strengthens the baking sheet while increasing the air-flow to food, creating evenly distributed heat for consistent baking every time. This beautiful geometric pattern is carried throughout most of the Taste of Home product lines, adding style and function to the tools in your kitchen. The Ash Gray color of the bakeware is complementary to modern kitchens. The premium non-stick coating allows for effortless release of foods and will enable you to prepare healthier treats with minimal to no prep to bakeware before baking process, leaving you to feel good about the food you're serving. The easy-to-grip handles make these baking sheets easy to transfer in and out of the oven. When it's time to clean up, simply place your bakeware in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. With two baking sheets, you can bake to feed a crowd or bake both dinner and dessert for your family at the same time; the possibilities are endless. All Taste of Home products are designed in partnership with and rigorously tested by the Taste of Home test kitchen and are Test Kitchen-approved. Make sure to snag your Taste of Home 2-Piece Non-Stick Metal Baking Sheet Set today. Manufactured and distributed under license from RDA Enthusiast Brands, LLC by Range Kleen Mfg., Inc. TASTE OF HOME marks and logos are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of RDA Enthusiast Brands, LLC. Copyright 2019 All rights reserved.
feature_bullets: "15 x 10 inch baking surface; 17.25 x 11.125 inch outer dimension including edge and handles 17 x 11 inch baking surface; 19.375 x 12 inch outer dimension including edge and handles"
Taste of Home Test Kitchen Approved.
Embossed design strengthens baking sheet while increasing air flow for even baking. Easy-to-grip edges. Non-stick coating ensures quick release and easy clean-up.
Suitable for all baking temperatures (not suitable for broiler). Suitable for dishwasher (hand-washing recommended). Fast and even heat distribution.
Ash Gray color. Made of durable non-stick coated steel. PTFE free.
